availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Street (Union County, Kentucky, tailor, postmaster, and assistant assessor.)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, tailor, postmaster, and assistant assessor. New York native. Married to Margaret "Mary" McLean Street. Father of Anna Street, Norman Street, Mary H. Street, Emma Street, and Edgar Street. Tailor in Union County in 1860. Postmaster for Uniontown in Union County from July 3, 1863, to December 12, 1865. U.S. assistant assessor in Union County.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Uniontown, p. 546.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Caseyville, p. 288A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994029, Butler County Births.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994038, Henderson County Births.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, Records of the Post Office Department, NARA Series M841, RG 28, X County, Kentucky, vol. 28, p. 188.
